channel.title: Meh. need to change the client background
channel.description: i want to change teh client background so that no one goes 'wtf its called choobscape on forums and luckscape on the client' any ideas? not sure wtf type of client it is...

item.title: Meh. need to change the client background
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

search title and maybe the picture will come up???

Read full topic
item.source: Meh. need to change the client background

item.title: Meh. need to change the client background
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Gizmo1m, post:7, topic:381408”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=477219.msg3491462#msg3491462 date=1296961473]

i will l0l if it does.

Edit: and it didnt…

Hmm… Theres this file that you have to edit to make it accept the picture, ill take a look.

Ok, this is on a delta client but if you can just look for the name in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java look for

createImage("./deltascape.jpg");

or just ("./oldclientname.jpg");
[/quote]

If she has no Idea what Client it is, You cannot be Certain which area it is in.[/quote]
You’re right, but basicly all you have to do is look for the old server name. i opened a client folder and searched Deltascape.j and it came up with class file and the background.

Read full topic

item.title: Meh. need to change the client background
item.dc:creator: @Gizmo1m Gizmo1m
item.description:
@Gizmo1m wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:6, topic:381408”][quote author=infalibl3 link=topic=477219.msg3491445#msg3491445 date=1296960489]
i will l0l if it does.

Edit: and it didnt…
[/quote]

Hmm… Theres this file that you have to edit to make it accept the picture, ill take a look.

Ok, this is on a delta client but if you can just look for the name in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java look for

createImage("./deltascape.jpg");

or just ("./oldclientname.jpg");[/quote]

If she has no Idea what Client it is, You cannot be Certain which area it is in.

Read full topic

item.title: Meh. need to change the client background
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“infalibl3, post:3, topic:381408”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=477219.msg3491339#msg3491339 date=1296953621]
There should be under the name of the original clients name or a JPEG file or whatever you use for your photo/paint things.
[/quote]
no jpegs or png’s or nothin in the whole client folder…which is suspicious and quite awkward.[/quote]
Make one then, just go in paint make one and name it Background.jpeg and put it in your client folder see if it works

Read full topic
